md:
giải nghĩa từ "accommodation" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* accommodation (noun)
	+ Meaning: a place to stay, especially in a hotel or a house
	+ Vietnamese: chỗ ở, chỗ trú
	+ Example: "The hotel offers comfortable accommodation for its guests."
	+ Related words: hotel, room, bed, stay
	+ Antonyms: departure, leave

* accommodation (noun)
	+ Meaning: the act of providing something that is needed or wanted
	+ Vietnamese: sự cung cấp, sự đáp ứng
	+ Example: "The company provides accommodation for its employees."
	+ Related words: provide, supply, offer, support
	+ Antonyms: refusal, denial

* accommodation (noun)
	+ Meaning: a change or adjustment made to something to make it suitable for a particular purpose
	+ Vietnamese: sự điều chỉnh, sự thay đổi
	+ Example: "The company made some accommodations to the software to make it more user-friendly."
	+ Related words: adjustment, modification, adaptation, change
	+ Antonyms: refusal, rejection

Note: The word "accommodation" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.

  • accommodation (noun)

    • Meaning: a place to stay, especially in a hotel or a house

  • accommodation (noun)

    • Example: "The company provides accommodation for its employees."
    • Related words: provide, supply, offer, support

  • accommodation (noun)

    • Meaning: a change or adjustment made to something to make it suitable for a particular purpose

    • Example: "The company made some accommodations to the software to make it more user-friendly."

Note: The word "accommodation" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used.
